snippet.title: A Duel Hand Disaster: Trackher | Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Sweet and to the point. A Duel Hand Disaster: Trackher was created in El Paso, Texas. It's the only split screen single player twin stick risk 'em up in which your score is meaningless unless you exist. Get out of that comfort zone. Push yourself, test yourself, and you will be rewarded.

Destroy the left to earn points. Recover the right to help multiply those points. In order to mark your position on the Capital List you must Extract. Playing till death is not an option. Push your luck and die during Sliver Bullet and WIPE YOUR LEADERBOARD POSITION.
